en: Oh give thanks unto Jehovah; for he is good; For his lovingkindness endureth for ever.
hmr: Aw LALPA kuomah lâwmthu hril ro, ama chu a ṭha sih a, A ngilneina khawm kumkhaw- tluongin a um ding a ni sih a.

en: Oh give thanks unto the God of gods; For his lovingkindness endureth for ever.
hmr: Aw, pathienhai Pathien kuoma chun lâwmthu hril ro, A ngilneina chu kumkhaw- tluongin a um ding a ni sih a.

en: Oh give thanks unto the Lord of lords; For his lovingkindness endureth for ever:
hmr: Aw, lalpahai LALPA kuoma chun lâwmthu hril ro, A ngilneina chu kumkhaw- tluongin a um ding a ni sih a.

en: To him who alone doeth great wonders; For his lovingkindness endureth for ever:
hmr: Ama khâta thilmak ropuitak thaw hlaktu kuoma chun: A ngilneina chu kumkhaw- tluongin a um ding a ni sih a.

en: To him that by understanding made the heavens; For his lovingkindness endureth for ever:
hmr: Varnaa vân siemtu kuoma chun: A ngilneina chu kumkhaw- tluongin a um ding a ni sih a.

en: To him that spread forth the earth above the waters; For his lovingkindness endureth for ever:
hmr: Hnuoi hi tui chunga sie duoitu kuoma chun: A ngilneina chu kumkhaw- tluongin a um ding a ni sih a.

en: To him that made great lights; For his lovingkindness endureth for ever:
hmr: Var ropuitakhai siemtu kuomah: A ngilneina chu kumkhaw- tluongin a um ding a ni sih a.

en: The sun to rule by day; For his lovingkindness endureth for ever;
hmr: Nisa, sûna rorêltu dinga: A ngilneina chu kumkhaw- tluongin a um ding a ni sih a.

en: The moon and stars to rule by night; For his lovingkindness endureth for ever:
hmr: Thla le arasihai zâna rorêltu dinga siemtu kuoma chun: A ngilneina chu kumkhaw- tluongin a um ding a ni sih a.

en: To him that smote Egypt in their first-born; For his lovingkindness endureth for ever;
hmr: Aiguptahai nau lutîr sukhlumpêk a: A ngilneina chu kumkhaw- tluongin a um ding a ni sih a.

en: And brought out Israel from among them; For his lovingkindness endureth for ever;
hmr: Israelhai anni laia inthawka ṭhuoi suoktu kuoma chun: A ngilneina chu kumkhaw- tluongin a um ding a ni sih a.

en: With a strong hand, and with an outstretched arm; For his lovingkindness endureth for ever:
hmr: Kut thahrât le bân phara: A ngilneina chu kumkhaw- tluongin a um ding a ni sih a.

en: To him that divided the Red Sea in sunder; For his lovingkindness endureth for ever;
hmr: Tuisuoriet Sen sukṭhetu kuoma chun: A ngilneina chu kumkhaw- tluongin a um ding a ni sih a.

en: And made Israel to pass through the midst of it; For his lovingkindness endureth for ever;
hmr: Israelhai a laitaka inkaitirtu: A ngilneina chu kumkhaw- tluongin a um ding a ni sih a.

en: But overthrew Pharaoh and his host in the Red Sea; For his lovingkindness endureth for ever:
hmr: Pharao le a sipaihai ruok chu Tuisuoriet Sena sukbohmangtu kuoma chun: A ngilneina chu kumkhaw- tluongin a um ding a ni sih a.

en: To him that led his people through the wilderness; For his lovingkindness endureth for ever:
hmr: A mihai thlalêra ṭhuoitu kuoma chun: A ngilneina chu kumkhaw- tluongin a um ding a ni sih a.

en: To him that smote great kings; For his lovingkindness endureth for ever;
hmr: Lal ropuitakhai sukhlumtu kuomah: A ngilneina chu kumkhaw- tluongin a um ding a ni sih a.

en: And slew famous kings; For his lovingkindness endureth for ever:
hmr: Lal hmingthangtak takhai sukhlumtu: A ngilneina chu kumkhaw- tluongin a um ding a ni sih a.

en: Sihon king of the Amorites; For his lovingkindness endureth forever;
hmr: Amorhai lal Sihon le, A ngilneina chu kumkhaw- tluongin a um ding a ni sih a.

en: And Og king of Bashan; For his lovingkindness endureth for ever;
hmr: Basan ram lal Og thattu: A ngilneina chu kumkhaw- tluongin a um ding a ni sih a.

en: And gave their land for a heritage; For his lovingkindness endureth for ever;
hmr: An ram rochana petu: A ngilneina chu kumkhaw- tluongin a um ding a ni sih a.

en: Even a heritage unto Israel his servant; For his lovingkindness endureth for ever:
hmr: A siehlaw Israel rochana petu kuoma chun, A ngilneina chu kumkhaw- tluongin a um ding a ni sih a.

en: Who remembered us in our low estate; For his lovingkindness endureth for ever;
hmr: Ama ei hnam tlâwm laia mi hre zingtu: A ngilneina chu kumkhaw- tluongin a um ding a ni sih a.

en: And hath delivered us from our adversaries; For his lovingkindness endureth for ever:
hmr: A mi dotuhaia inthawkin a mi sanhim a: A ngilneina chu kumkhaw- tluongin a um ding a ni sih a.

en: Who giveth food to all flesh; For his lovingkindness endureth for ever.
hmr: Ama chun tisa po po kuoma chun fâk ding a pêk hlak a: A ngilneina chu kumkhaw- tluongin a um ding a ni sih a.

en: Oh give thanks unto the God of heaven; For his lovingkindness endureth for ever.
hmr: Aw, vân Pathien kuoma chun lâwmthu hril ro: A ngilneina chu kumkhaw- tluongin a um ding a ni sih a.
